name: Rebirth
description: Christopher Booker's archetypal plot where a character is redeemed through love or spiritual awakening
distribution_philosophy: Based on Booker's rebirth structure emphasizing the fall, imprisonment, and redemptive awakening

initial_state.name: Initial State
initial_state.description: The character is shown in a state of spiritual or emotional darkness

call_to_life.name: Call to Life
call_to_life.description: An innocent figure or pure love enters the character's world

resistance.name: Resistance
resistance.description: The character initially resists or fails to recognize the redemptive force

crisis.name: Crisis
crisis.description: A moment of truth where the character must choose between old and new ways

final_awakening.name: Final Awakening
final_awakening.description: The character experiences spiritual rebirth and embraces love
